name: Buddy Bistro
description:
Buddy Bistro is a cafe-management game, mixed with a visual novel-style conversation system, similar to games like VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action and Coffee Talk. Take the role of the owner of "Buddy Bistro" as you serve food to your animal customers during a long and stormy night.
